name: Kodiak Flare Kit with Launcher and Flares
categories: Flare Kit with Launcher and Flares
description: Carry 3 flares, 2 bear bangers, and a launcher in a secure, waterproof case. It allows you to carry a banger and launcher fastened together outside the case, in a secure latched holder that prevents it from firing accidently.Waterproof case has a belt clip and carabiner.Includes: 1 case, 1 launcher, 2 bear bangers, and 3 flares.2 internal rows of storage, each row holds either 2 bangers or 3 flares.Space for one unloaded launcher on the inside.Secure latched storage for one loaded launcher on the outside.Desiccant bag glued in to remove moisture.
